routing.community

Interface Centrality

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvgDegreeCentrality, CWindowCentrality, DegreeCentrality, SWindowCentrality

    public interface Centrality

    Abstracts the concept of a centrality computation algorithm (where Centrality is defined in the context of a social network). For the purposes of routing protocols like Distributed Bubble Rap, centrality must be computed globally, using the history of all previous contacts, and locally, using only the contact history of those hosts in some local community, where the community is defined by some community detection algorithm.

    In this way, the Centrality interface semantically requires any class employing one of its subclasses to keep track of the connection history of the node at which these instancces are stored. To use the local centrality computation, the using object would also have to create and use a CommunityDetection instance. As of right now, DistributedBubbleRap is the only class that does this.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getGlobalCentrality(java.util.Map<DTNHost,java.util.List<Duration>> connHistory)
      Returns the computed global centrality based on the connection history passed as an argument.
      double getLocalCentrality(java.util.Map<DTNHost,java.util.List<Duration>> connHistory, CommunityDetection cd)
      Returns the computed local centrality based on the connection history and community detection objects passed as parameters.
      Centrality replicate()
      Duplicates a Centrality object.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalCentrality

        double getGlobalCentrality(java.util.Map<DTNHost,java.util.List<Duration>> connHistory)
        Returns the computed global centrality based on the connection history passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        connHistory - Contact History on which to compute centrality
        Returns:
        Value corresponding to the global centrality

      • getLocalCentrality

        double getLocalCentrality(java.util.Map<DTNHost,java.util.List<Duration>> connHistory,
                          CommunityDetection cd)
        Returns the computed local centrality based on the connection history and community detection objects passed as parameters.
        Parameters:
        connHistory - Contact history on which to compute centrality
        cd - CommunityDetection object that knows the local community
        Returns:
        Value corresponding to the local centrality

      • replicate

        Centrality replicate()
        Duplicates a Centrality object. This is a convention of the ONE to easily create multiple instances of objects based on defined settings.
        Returns:
        A duplicate Centrality instance
